TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit UpdateInfo extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Contains the information used to update the endpoint address of a specific registration entry in the lookup table of a peer resolver service.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Instances of this class are primarily used to pass registration update request information to the resolver service from a network client of that service.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new default instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public UpdateInfo (Guid registrationId, Guid client, string meshId, System.ServiceModel.PeerNodeAddress address);

Docs.param: <xref:System.Guid> that specifies the unique ID of the registration entry to update.
<xref:System.Guid> that specifies the unique ID of the peer client that submitted the updated registration entry information.
<xref:System.String> that contains the mesh ID of the entry.
that contains the endpoint address to update for the registration entry.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the supplied peer client ID, registration ID, peer mesh ID, and peer endpoint address.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A peer can have multiple entries for any mesh ID, each for a specific peer endpoint. Each endpoint entry is updated separately.

Docs.summary: Gets the unique ID of the peer client that submitted the updated registration entry information.
Docs.value: <xref:System.Guid> that specifies the unique ID of the peer client that submitted the updated registration entry information.

Docs.summary: Indicates whether the body of the message containing a serialized instance of this type is correctly formed.
Docs.returns: True if the registration update information body is correctly-formed by the sender; false if it is not.
